website_summaries.verdict: These are a very lightweight, high-quality choice for stylish distinction and enhanced practicality due to the larger, face-wrapping lenses. Additional lens tints included with the set extend usability to many purposes, whether for sports or casual wear.
pros: Polarized lenses with three interchangeable additional lenses
Larger lens for more coverage against bugs and debris
Nose and temple pads to grip and stay on, without pinching
cons: Less likely to fit smaller-framed faces
Over time, the nosepiece can come lose
Some shipments did not contain the clear lens

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses, extremely poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Being able to change lenses for different conditions is a great idea. However, the service dept. at Smith Optics is unicorn-like. There are rumors, but I can't confirm there is a service department. I was on hold one day long enough to drain 40% of my phone charge. I heard a few different recordings saying how much they valued my call, but they never valued it enough to answer it. I own four pair of Smith Optics sunglasses, and I doubt I would buy another. There are other companies with the same technologies used by Smith. I paid too much for the sunglasses I have to get that poor quality of service.
customer_reviews.author: jim vanbergen

customer_reviews.title: Good specs but kinda pricey
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, meets expectations, but a little expensive. Some cheaper alternatives to check out might be Hobie or Eagle Eyes. Nearly the same quality at 1/3 to 1/2 the price. Don't be afraid to go with the Parallel Max D if you want full coverage. I originally bought the Parallel and found they left a HUGE gap at the bottom for light and glare. The Parallel Max close most of that gap, but they still leave some room at the bottom of the lens. I'm 6'0 and 200 lbs, if I ever get another pair, I'll be going with the Parallel Max D for full coverage.
customer_reviews.author: snakepliskin

customer_reviews.title: Good sport sunglasses - running and fishing (not at the same time)
customer_reviews.text: Best feature - great coverage and crisp vision. The glasses are light weight and worked well for running. I got the copper polarized as the main lens. It's darker than the brown polarized. There is an amber (yellow) polarized for lower light conditions. Most lens combinations have only one polarized lens and an ignitor and clear. This one does not have a clear lens. I have not tried them for fishing, yet. But, I expect they will work well. Only minor issue - little soreness on right ear. Did not happen with every wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Mark London

customer_reviews.title: Pair #3
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair. The only problem is that after about 2 years of wearing them 7 days a week they get stretched out and the lenses are scratched. But I am a lineman and very hard on gear. My family also wears these.
customer_reviews.author: Mykel

customer_reviews.title: Missing lenses
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with only two sets of replaceable lenses as opposed to the three that were supposed to be in the package. Sent message to seller. Will this review with results. Have owned Smith glasses in the past. Lightweight, durable and good quality. Update: Seller responded saying manufacturer now include only two lenses in the package. Maybe think about changing the item description so buyers can decide whether the item is worth the money or not?
customer_reviews.author: Ddomi

customer_reviews.title: Owned Smith Optics for years
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Smith Optics for years and was horribly saddened when I finally lost my Parallel Max. I am so happy I found them here on Amazon. I use the swappable lens for many different activities.
customer_reviews.author: Cocomo56

customer_reviews.title: Best fit I’ve ever found.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been an Oakley fan for years and years. Converted me as soon as I tried these on. They never touch my longer eyelashes which means the insides don’t smudge which means less cleaning which means less drops which means less scratches. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonConsumer

customer_reviews.title: The order did not come with the specified clear lenses - incomplete order
customer_reviews.text: The order was incomplete - no clear lenses in the shipment. The glasses are comfortable, light-weight with good optics. They fog very easily in temperature shifts so are of limited use for alpine/cross country skiing, snowshoeing or cycling in cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Maude

customer_reviews.title: Decent glasses
customer_reviews.text: Description didn't say they were the max style until after purchase. I would have preferred the Parallel vs Max due to Max's size. They fit unless your moving due to size of them.over all decent and I didn't want to deal with returns
customer_reviews.author: rick davis

customer_reviews.title: Converted me from Native
customer_reviews.text: I was a die-hard native fan. Recently I couldn't find the tortoise/brownish frame color, so I found the color I like in Smith. These sunglasses feel so much more sturdy than the Natives I had been wearing for the last 15 years. The optics are great and they don't feel any heavier, still very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: MTgirl

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, but lens coating wears off very quickly
customer_reviews.text: When brand new, these provided sharp, clear vision. However, within just a couple of weeks of daily use the gold coating wore off around the edges of both lenses, making them uncomfortable to wear. Not the quality I expected for this price!
customer_reviews.author: JaysonA

customer_reviews.title: This item ships with two -- not three -- lenses
customer_reviews.text: The product description for this product is very misleading. There are only two sets of lenses, not three. I just received mine and checked the reviews and found others had complained of the same problem. This is unacceptable and should not be tolerated on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: "mgilhuly"

customer_reviews.title: My favorite all around sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I use these for all yard work and riding my Harley. Great wind protection. these are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy T.

customer_reviews.title: Vision quality outside
customer_reviews.text: Best sunglasses i have ever had. Going to buy another pair for my best friends birthday.
customer_reviews.author: diane wagoner

customer_reviews.title: No clear lenses
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses. I've had several pair before. The reason for only three stars is because they didn't come with a set of clear lenses described in the add. I use the clear lenses for Mt. biking in the woods. I've read other reviewers complain about the same thing. Hopefully Amazon gets this fixed for future buyers of these.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I Love these glasses! They’re sooo comfortable. Comes with an awesome case and extra lens.
customer_reviews.author: Corissa

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Shipping and product as advertised. Quality product and great communication
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality glasses, even when used
customer_reviews.text: So I got a used pair and they are better than the cheap $20 glasses I have bought. I have no worries that these are going to break, and they do a great job of protecting my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Average

customer_reviews.title: I love these sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought Oakley three times consecutively because of the quality, and when I started cycling I needed removable lenses. I bought Uvex for the light weight and removable lenses, but it was never the quality of Oakley optically. I decided to give Smith Optics a try, with the Parallel Max, and they are the perfect cycling glasses. I love the quality of the lenses, even the non-polarized lenses. I think they have the quality of the Oakley's with the light weight and a removable lens. When I decide to buy new sunglasses I will definitely buy Smith Optics.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pearse

customer_reviews.title: Daughter liked it.
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift to my daughter. She loved them.
customer_reviews.author: DKS

customer_reviews.title: Good Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I got these for the clear lenses, using them as comfy safety glasses. The fit could be a tad better resulting in the 4 stars. Other than that they fulfill a multi-purpose role since I can use them as sun glasses too. This is my second pair, the others were much older and lasted till I lost them 4-5 years.
customer_reviews.author: greg mccalla

customer_reviews.title: My old favorite returns
customer_reviews.text: Have had a pair of these for years and just got two new sets to replace a crushed and a lost frame. They are durable, super light, and great for many activities - including cycling and driving. The polarized Amber lenses magically clarify and brighten the surroundings during low light or fog. You will not regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P Boos

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, great optics
customer_reviews.text: Excellent optic performance, lightweight, and yet they stay on my head even at high speeds (boating). I have three pairs and Keep them like reading glasses, at convenient locations.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Loved them from the minute I got them.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth j scott

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, comfortable fit and interchangeable lenses. I plan to purchase a few different colors of the polarized lenses for different conditions when I am out fishing. These look and feel so comfortable that I bought a second pair for cycling.
customer_reviews.author: Rick G.

customer_reviews.title: Fits my husband well underneath his motorcycle helmet
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good pair of polarized shades for my husband to wear under his motorcycle helmet. He's VERY picky about sunglasses so it was a gamble. Per his 2 cents, they are a good fit, nice to see through, and fit perfectly under the helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Hypatia

customer_reviews.title: She likes them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife. They are expensive, but they make her happy. Happy wife-> Happy life!
customer_reviews.author: V. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Don't order the ' Smith Parallel Max Sunglass (Black, Polarized Gray/Ignitor/Clear)' and expect what you were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses, but they DO NOT send the ones I wanted. I wanted THESE in the picture. I always get the black ones. What gives? It's been THREE times now. Where's the cust. service?
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J Savage

customer_reviews.title: Smith makes great optics and their no-slip nose pieces and light weight ...
customer_reviews.text: Smith makes great optics and their no-slip nose pieces and light weight make them great for workouts and yard work.
customer_reviews.author: WFP

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: Crisp and clear lens, great fit. My last two pair of natives the lens were not correct, glad I changed to Smith.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these with a little trepidation, since I could not try them on before I bought them, but they are a perfect fit. I could not be any happier with these sunglasses. They are as good as all the 5 star ratings that other customers assigned them. Well, here is one more perfectly happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Gene H.

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice to get what I order
customer_reviews.text: Not the right color they were supposed to be pearl frames but they were white and only 2 lenses this was a disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sunglasses. Clarity is as good as anything I've ever owned and the multiple lens selection is just a bonus. Stay on my head unlike most other sunglasses I've owned. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: the best fitting and optically effective sunglasses that I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: These are, by far, the best fitting and optically effective sunglasses that I've ever worn. I run and bike with amber lenses and drive with the brown lenses. No distortion. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: RDC

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, lightweight, interchangeable/replaceable lenses... but where are the promised clear lenses?
customer_reviews.text: I got these for running and other outdoor activities and they work great... they are light, stay put, are comfortable, have excellent optical quality and best of all.. have interchangeable/replaceable lenses... which are a great idea since just yesterday I accidentally flipped them off my hat onto rocks and got a tiny scratch in one lens so I guess I'll be buying new lenses... cheaper than buying a new pair though. UPDATE: Bought another pair as my first are now at the bottom of Lake Superior :( The second pair are just as great EXCEPT they didn't come with the clear lenses... only the gray and amber. Disappointed but I still have my clear lenses from my first pair.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. V.

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these glasses for some time now and they work great. I w as worried that there might be an issue with the amount of light that would come through, but no issues at all. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Seequil

customer_reviews.title: love them. They never slide off my face while ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair in 15 yrs. love them. They never slide off my face while biking.
customer_reviews.author: becfro

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It didn't come with all the lenses it was supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Wolfson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for trail running and cycling. I wish the fit were a little more snug at the temples.
customer_reviews.author: JRP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better looking and more comfortable than the Oakley's they replaced.
customer_reviews.author: skuls

customer_reviews.title: Look and work exceptionally well.
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Smith is definitely my favorite brand, especially for multi-lense and polarized products.
customer_reviews.author: Bnewb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Made with quality. Not a blemish on the finish product that I received. THey have the light weight feel to them as you wear them compare to others. Your vision is clear and precise, not impacted by the glasses. Perfect for everyday wear, excising like running, and even at the shooting range. The Sunglasses purchase came with: - Frame - nice smmoth black finish - Polarized Grey Lenses, no defects - Ignition Lenses -- redish colour - Clear Lenses -- umm clear - Case--- an excellent case, regtangle in shape, hard shell, holds the galsses and two extra sets of lens
customer_reviews.author: NSWMEDICRUNNER

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Eyewear
customer_reviews.text: These are without a doubt the best sunglasses I've ever worn! I recently wore them 20+ hrs a day for 10 days while on a fishing trip in Alaska, and unless it was raining, I couldn't even tell that I was wearing them. Extremely good fit, and the quality of the lenses... well, they are Smith Optics... 'nough said.
customer_reviews.author: Cotter Fan

customer_reviews.title: Shademan
customer_reviews.text: Great looking quality sun glasses. Polarized lenses are great for fishing. These glasses are a great fit for a normal size and shape head.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Best Sunglasses I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these awesome sun glasses for 10 years and though I tried all the other high quality glasses, nothing can compare to the comfort, lense quality, durability and look. So happy with my new pair of Smiths!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The fit, the lenses, the color. They are perfect for running, early in the morning, with the sun hitting your face.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Moreira

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier with these glasses. Fit perfect, changing lenses is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the color of the lens. Good fit for a small women's head.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses they fit so well.
customer_reviews.text: I lost my old smith sunglasses at the lake and decided to replace them with some oakleys. They oakleys were not comfortable so I bought another setup of the smith glasses and these seem even better then the old ones I had.
customer_reviews.author: Rob L.

customer_reviews.title: They could be used all the time but are a great fit when riding
customer_reviews.text: This is my husband's second pair since he likes them so much since the idiot lost his first pair. They could be used all the time but are a great fit when riding, barely fog up. Lens exchange is easy enough and my husband personally thinks that with all the fancy colors they have it's best to stick to the brown polarized ones so you get the most for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Y. C. M.

customer_reviews.title: came in an awesome case with clear and rose lenses
customer_reviews.text: came in an awesome case with clear and rose lenses. The case has special little sleeves for the spare lenses to sit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smith Parallel Max for Paragliding
customer_reviews.text: Top sunglasses, perfect coverage, no side reflections, no bottom frame. Don't really need the exchange glasses, but reckon it would help when paragliding at night ;) Perfect fit under helmet. Tip: Buy an extra set of the brown lenses before they don't make them anymore....
customer_reviews.author: flywolf

customer_reviews.title: I love these sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these sunglasses. They're probably some of the best out there for the money you're going to spend. Also, shipped on time and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely my favorite sunglasses. They fit perfect and look great too!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A. Boullard

customer_reviews.title: love my shades
customer_reviews.text: these are my "go to" shades. I use them for driving, golf and fishing. Great optics and love the interchangable lenses.
customer_reviews.author: whitewater32927

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Platinum Mirror/Ignitor/Clear The information on these glasses clearly stated three lenses were included. They came with only two, the clear was missing. I am disappointed they did not come as indicated on the Amazon site.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Great Product & Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Smith has been making optics for sports enthusiasts for a long time. This particular product is light weight and has many lens options depending on sun conditions, particular application or just wearing every day.
customer_reviews.author: DMZ

customer_reviews.title: Smith Parallel Max Sunglass
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the sunglasses for running and think they are fantastic. Very light weight but don't move around at all when worn. Very happy with the purchase. I do wish a cleaner cloth was included though..
customer_reviews.author: Marc Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and durable
customer_reviews.text: I really like these sunglasses - they are durable, the quality is good, and I like that they come with 3 lenses (including a dark/polarized one which is excellent).
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Pierre LeGoaller

customer_reviews.title: parallel max sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these sunglasses! Easy to interchange lenses and despite my narrow face, they fit comfortably and secure. Very nice looking, a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Had a pair that were stolen, so I replaced them with the same exact model. Lenses are very easy to replace. Frame is very light and fits my head perfectly. The frameless bottom lets sweat drop out without clouding up the lenses. If I were to buy again, I may spring for the Parallel D Max for the extra cover. On very bright days, the Parallel Max could use a bit more coverage. However, the Parallel Max lens size probably fits a wider range of light conditions better than the D Max.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What I expected
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses are exactly what I expected. They fit very nicely and the lenses are great. The extra lenses are easy to change out.
customer_reviews.author: T-Bone

customer_reviews.title: I've owned several pairs of Smith glasses and love them. However
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several pairs of Smith glasses and love them. However, I am giving this product one star because it was sent without the clear lenses that are stated in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, perfect lenses
customer_reviews.text: This is my third set of Smith sunglasses and this lower-rimless model with these not-too-dark polarized lenses are perfect. They do not look as flamboyant as in the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Samad

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, but that doesn't mean they're not VERY good.
customer_reviews.text: Yet another mislabeled amazon item. They look blue, right? They're black. The frame appears clear? It's black too. They fit my face pretty well, I'll give them that. But a good fit is NOT WORTH $130, neither is the 'polarization' that seemed to have absolutely zero advantage over my current seven eleven pair. Don't get me wrong, they're fantastic sunglasses and the lenses they come with are good for taking the windshield glare from driving, but that simply is not worth what is charged. Then again, neither is any apple product ever.
customer_reviews.author: Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Parallel Max Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses with a great fit! Interchangeable lenses are perfect for fishing in different light settings! Lenses snap in and out easily. This is my 3rd pair. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised at how much these lighten things up. They're great on overcast days and block just the right amount on sunny ones. Fit great, too.
customer_reviews.author: D Holton

customer_reviews.title: Photos are not accurate at all
customer_reviews.text: The Products were not even close to what was pictured. The lenses and frames are entirely different than what the photo shows. Super Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Croken

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Product. Rather than a pair of sunglasses, ...
customer_reviews.text: Wrong Product. Rather than a pair of sunglasses, I received clear replacement lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Smith Optics Parallel Max Sunglasses
product_meta.description: Smith optics is a medium fit/large coverage with a grilamid TR90 frame. Includes megol nose and temple pads has carbonic TLT lenses and 9 base lens curvature.
feature_bullets: Three Interchangeable Carbonic TLT Lenses Included
Evolve Frame Material with Hydroleophobic Lens Coating and Hydrophilic Megol Nose and Temple Pads
